sense.def:
The sequel to a book or film
je nova knjiga ali film, v katerem se nadaljuje zgodba nekega prejšnjega filma ali knjige.

seg.quote: He starred in ‘The Godfather’ and in its sequel, ‘The Godfather II’.

sense.def:
The sequel to an event
je nekaj, kar se zgodi po nekem dogodku ali zaradi njega.

seg.quote: There was an amusing sequel to this incident.
